p: The model was applied at country‐level to estimate HIV incidence and rate among PWID for the current year. Estimated incidence among PWID was compared to the number of incident HIV infections in the total population as estimated by UNAIDS Spectrum model 16. The number of incident infections among sexual partners of PWID and of ex‐PWID living with HIV for the current year was estimated. Separate parameterization and estimations were made for regular and non‐regular sexual partners, with their sum reported in the results.
